title: Learn with Katti
text:
Essential IT Skills for Everyone


This 1-week course is a live, online and multilingual interactive course on Excel, PowerPoint and Word. Build a strong foundation, learn the latest features, get tips and tricks on how to use AI Tools, career guidance and bonus resources worth 💲💲💲

title: Vishal Katti
text: Vishal Katti resides in Bengaluru, India with his wife and 6yo daughter, but constantly longs for the sun and sands of Goa 🌞🏖️🌴 where he spent most of his childhood.

title: Essential IT Skills for Everyone
text:
It doesn’t matter if you are an under-graduate student or a working professional.
It doesn’t matter if you are in an IT or a non-IT profession.
It doesn’t matter if you are a businessperson or working professional.
It doesn’t matter if you know nothing about Excel, PowerPoint or Word.

No matter who you are, it is highly unlikely that your life is not influenced by these tools or by people using these tools.
By the end of this 1-week course, you will understand how to leverage these tools to effectively bump up your productivity, and save hours of precious time for yourself.

Enroll Now, limited seats only!

title: Essential IT Skills for Everyone
section: How is this course different from others?
text:
How is this course different from others?
There are many online courses on Udemy, Coursera, Edureka etc., which are probably priced the same or even less than this course. Then why should you take this course❓








Topic
Other Online Courses
Essential IT Skills for Everyone




Mode of Instruction
💢 Recorded Videos
✅ Live and Online


Interaction with Instructor
💢 Minimal or None. No scope to get real-time answers to specific problems
✅ Full Fledged Video Interaction with real-time answers addressing your specific questions


Interaction with other participants
💢 Limited or through comments only or self-learning only.
✅ Batch-wise WhatsApp group for collaborative learning and sharing of experiences


Language of Instruction
💢 Single Language (usually English)
✅ Multi-lingual (English, Hindi, Marathi and/or Kannada)


Course Content
💢 Fixed and outdated!
✅ Latest Features and techniques, syllabus gets updated with new features launched for Excel, PowerPoint or Word


Best Practices
💢 Minimal or non-existent
✅ Special attention to inculcate industry-approved best practices at every step


Individual Attention
💢 Minimal
✅ Guaranteed Individual attention due to small batch size (20 persons only)


Helpful Add-ins and AI Tools
💢 Minimal
✅ Curated list of Add-Ins and AI Tools for enhanced learning and Productivity


Career Guidance
💢 Non Existent
✅ Individual advice for all participants



This course aims to establish a strong foundation in Excel, PowerPoint and Word along with Industry-certified best practices and helpful AI tools. This course will also ignite your brain with ideas about report automation and documentation.

Awesome! Sign me up! –>

title: Essential IT Skills for Everyone
text:
What will you get?






🎓 Expert-Curated Curriculum





The course content has been specially curated by Vishal Katti, who is also the Instructor for this course. The course introduces the most used features and some hidden gems which most people are unaware. The Instructor demonstrates some game-changing feature-combos across Excel, PowerPoint and Word.
Course Plan
Day 1

Introduction to MS Excel
MS Excel Basics (Tables, Charts, Formula, Functions)

Day 2

Excel Advanced (Pivot Tables, PowerQuery)
Introduction to Excel VBA (Macro Programming)
Bonus track

Day 3

Introduction to Presentations (MS PowerPoint)
MS PowerPoint Basics (Animations, Transitions, 3D Models)
Bonus track

Day 4

Introduction to Documents (MS Word)
MS Word Basic (Table of Contents, Insert Tables, Images, Linking, Mail Merge)
Bonus Track

Day 5

Answering the question “Where will I use this?”
Walk-through of AI Tools for enhanced learning
Doubt Clearing and Career Guidance













🚀 LIVE Webinar with Hands-On Experience with Labs.





This course is going to be Live, which means you will be able to interact with the Instructor in real-time. No more recorded videos where the presenter doesn’t pay attention to you or your chat messages!!









💬 Multilingual Interaction





The Instructor is well-versed in English, Hindi, Marathi and Kannada. He also understands Konkani and Punjabi but not enough to respond in the same language. This means that you can ask a question in any of these languages and expect an answer to your specific question immediately.









🌟 Personalized Attention





With a small batch size of only 20 participants, the Instructor promises that you get personalized attention guaranteeing an experience worth every penny! For an absolute paisa-vasool experience, make sure that you come with an open mind, ready to learn and be open to new ideas.









😎 AI Tools





A curated list of AI Tools will be demonstrated which will help not only cement your learning but also help you boost your productivity while using Excel, PowerPoint and Word!









✨ Bonus Resources





🎓 Certificate of Completion (T&C Apply)
🎯 Guided Workbook for Practicing Excel Functions worth $500
⚡ Excel Add-in with Time-saving VBA Macros worth $1000
🤩 50 ready-to-use PowerPoint Templates worth $200
💲 A Referral Code to earn your money back!!!




Great! Let’s go already! –>

title: Essential IT Skills for Everyone
text:
Batch Timings
Registrations are currently open for June, July and August 2024 batches.
It is a 5-day program from Monday to Friday, from 9:00 PM - 11:00 PM Indian Standard Time (IST).

title: Essential IT Skills for Everyone
text:
Enroll Now!!






Terms and Conditions






Deadline for Registration: The final date for registration for a batch is 2 days before the start of the batch
Cancellation Policy: Should a registrant wish to cancel their registration; they may do so freely until the aforementioned deadline and get a FULL REFUND. Any cancellation requests received after this time will get PARTIAL REFUND of their Registration Fees minus a penalty of ₹ 500/- up until the commencement of the course. Once a batch starts, all registrations become final, and NO REFUND will be issued under any circumstances.
Change of Batch: This is subject to availability of free slots in other scheduled batches.
Punctuality and Attendance: Participants are expected to adhere to scheduled session times punctually, respecting the time commitments of all involved.
Live Course Content: We encourage participants to engage actively during sessions, as the course is conducted live and does not offer recorded content for review.
Certificate of Completion: Participants who attend all 5 days of a batch and submit the final assignment within 7 days of batch completion will be given a Certificate of Completion








 I hereby declare that I have read and agree to the Terms & Conditions.

CLICK TO REGISTER
